home.title: EmpowerHub
home.subtitle: Ku Tiyisisa Vanwanati hi Nseketelo wo Hlanganisiwa
home.tagline: Ku tiyisisa ku tiyimela, vuhlayiseki na xikwembu.

financialSupport.title: Nseketelo wa Timali
financialSupport.description: Kuma switsundzuxo swa ku tshama mali leswi lulamiseriweke eka wena naswona u nghena eka minhlangano ya timali leyi tiyisisaka.

gbvSupport.title: Nseketelo wa GBV
gbvSupport.description: Kuma nseketelo wo hatlisa na tindhawu to hlayiseka to sirheleka loko u ti lava swinene.

sanitaryAid.title: Mpfuno wa Ku Basisa
sanitaryAid.description: Kuma mabokisi ya swiphiwo ya le kufupi naswona u fikelela switirhisiwa swa ku basisa leswi lavekaka.

aiAssistant.title: Mupfuni wa AI
aiAssistant.description: Kuma tinhlamulo to hatlisa na nhlamuselo ku suka eka sisiteme ya hina ya nseketelo leyi rhandzaka.

submitRequests.title: Rhumela Swikombelo
submitRequests.description: Rhumela naswona u landzelela swikombelo swa wena swa nseketelo hi sisiteme ya hina leyi olova ku yi tirhisa.

aboutUs.title: Hi Hina
aboutUs.description: Dyondza swo tala hi xikongomelo xa hina xo tiyisisa vanwanati eka Afrika Dzonga hinkwayo.

cta.title: U Lulamerile ku Sungula?
cta.description: Joyina tinkume ta vanwanati lava kumeke nseketelo na ku tiyisisiwa hi pulatifomo ya hina.
cta.button: Rhumela Xikombelo xa Wena xo Sungula

requests.title: Swikombelo swa Nseketelo
requests.subtitle: Rhumela swikombelo swintshwa naswona u landzelela leswi nga kona
requests.noRequestsDesc: Sungula hi ku rhumela xikombelo xa wena xa nseketelo xa xo sungula
requests.name: Vito

req001.description: Ndzi lava switsundzuxo swa ku nyika mali eka bindzu lerintsongo

req002.name: A swi tiveki
req002.description: Ndzi lava rungula ra ndhawu yo sirheleka hi xihatla

req003.description: Ndzi lava mabokisi ya mpfuno lama nga kona ya swilo swa ku basisa

finance.title: Ku Tiyisisa hi Mali
finance.subtitle: Kuma switsundzuxo swa mali leswi endleriweke wena, nghenelela eka tikhongolose ta mali leti tiyisisaka, naswona u aka ndlela ya wena ya vuxaka bya ikhonomi

seminar1.title: Vanwana eka Bindzu: Ku Sungula Vuxaka bya Mali bya Wena
seminar1.location: Senthara ya Vaaki ya Cape Town
seminar1.description: Dyondza swisekelo swa vuxaka bya mali na ndlela yo sungula ku aka pfumo ra wena ra vumundzuku.

seminar2.title: Workshop ya Vuxaka bya Mali bya Munhu hi Xiyexe
seminar2.description: Maendlelo lama tirhaka ya ku fikelela vuxaka bya mali tanihi munwana loyi a tirhaka hi xiyexe.

seminar3.title: Ku Hlayela Mali na Ku Hlayisa ka Vanwana lava Tirhaka hi Voxe
seminar3.description: Vuswikoti bya nkoka bya ku hlayela mali na maendlelo ya ku hlayisa lama endleriweke vanwana lava tirhaka hi voxe.

emergencyFund.title: Aka Xikwama xa Swiyimo swa Xihatla
emergencyFund.description: Sungula hi ku hlayisa swikalo swa tin'hweti ta 3-6 eka swiyimo leswi nga langutekangiki.

education.title: Nyika Mali eka Dyondzo ya Mali
education.description: Vutivi i matimba. Dyondza hi ku hlayela mali, vuxaka bya mali, na ku hlela mali.

diversifyIncome.title: Hambanyisa Mbuyelo wa Wena
diversifyIncome.description: Aka swihlovo swo tala swa mbuyelo ku engetela ku tiyimiseka ka mali.

retirement.title: Hlela Ku Yima ka Ntirho ri nga si Fiki
retirement.description: Loko u sungula ri nga si fiki, mali ya wena yi na nkarhi wo tala wa ku kula.

trackExpenses.title: Landzelela Swikalo swa Wena
trackExpenses.description: Ku twisisa laha mali ya wena yi yaka kona i goza ro sungula ra ku lawula mali.

sanitaryAid.title: Mpfuno wa Ku Basisa & Nseketelo wa Vutomi
sanitaryAid.subtitle: Kuma swilo swa mahala swa ku basisa na swilaveko swa vutomi eka mabokisi ya hina ya mpfuno eAfrika Dzonga

donationBins.title: Mabokisi ya Mpfuno
donationBins.lastRestocked: Ku Tlhela ku Teka ka Makumu

capeTown.name: Senthara ya Vaaki ya Cape Town
capeTown.address: 123 Main Street, Cape Town, Western Cape
capeTown.description: Senthara leyikulu ya vaaki leyi nyikaka swilo swa nkoka swa ku basisa eka vanwana va ndhawu.

johannesburg.name: Senthara ya Vanwana ya Johannesburg
johannesburg.description: Senthara leyi tirhisiweke ku pfuna vanwana hi swilo swa ku basisa na nseketelo.

durban.name: Senthara ya Rihanyu ra Durban
durban.description: Senthara ya rihanyu leyi nyikaka swilo swa ku basisa na dyondzo ya rihanyu.

tips.tip1: Cinca maphedi kumbe mathamponi nkarhi wun'wana hi tiawara ta 4-6
tips.tip2: Hlamba mavoko ya wena ku nga si tirhi na endzhaku ka ku tirhisa swilo swa n'hweti
tips.tip3: Tirhisa swilo leswi baseke leswi nga riki na swilo leswi kotekaka
tips.tip4: Hlayisa swilo leswi nga si tirhisiwi endhawini leyi omeke, leyi tondeke

tips.tip1: Hlamba miri hinkwawo siku rin'wana na rin'wana hi sepe leyi baseke
tips.tip2: Ambala swambalo leswi baseke, leswi omeke
tips.tip3: Hlayisa ndhawu ya wena ya le ndzeni yi basile naswona yi oma
tips.tip4: Nwa mati yo tala naswona u dya swakudya leswi nga na rihanyu leri kahle

tips.tip1: Mindzila leyi baseke yi nga tirhisiwa tanihi ncinco wa nkarhi wo koma
tips.tip2: Swakudya leswi tondeke swi nga pfuna ku hunguta ku vava ka n'hweti
tips.tip3: Mati ya ku fudumala ya nga pfuna ku rhurisa misayina
tips.tip4: Lava mpfuno wa vadokodela loko ku ri na swiphiqo leswi nga tolovelekangiki

donation.title: Nyika Swilo
donation.description: Hi amukela mpfuno wa swilo swa ku basisa ku pfuna vanwana va ndhawu. Leswi i swilo leswi lavekaka swinene:

items.sanitaryProducts: Swilo swa ku basisa ka n'hweti (maphedi, mathamponi, tikombe)
items.hygieneItems: Swilo swa ku basisa (sepe, shampoo, buroxi ya meno)
items.underwear: Swambalo swa le ndzeni leswintshwa, leswi nga tirhisiwangiki

donation.learnMore: Dyondza Swo Tala hi Ku Nyika

gbvSupport.title: Nseketelo wa GBV & Tindhawu to Sirheleka
gbvSupport.subtitle: Kuma nseketelo wa xihatla, tindhawu to sirheleka leti sirhelekeke, na switsundzuxo swa vadokodela swo hundzula vudyohi bya rixaka
gbvSupport.emergencyAlert: Loko u ri eka swiyimo swa xihatla, fonela 10111 kumbe 112 hi xihatla

safeShelters.title: Tindhawu to Sirheleka leti Sirhelekeke
safeShelters.subtitle: Tindhawu leti fihliweke to sirheleka vanwana lava lavaka ndhawu yo sirheleka

safeHaven.name: Ndhawu yo Sirheleka ya Safe Haven
safeHaven.services: Yindlu, swakudya, nseketelo wa miehleketo, nseketelo wa nawu
safeHaven.description: Ndhawu yo sirheleka ya 24/7 ya vanwana lava lavaka ndhawu yo sirheleka hi xihatla.

newBeginnings.name: Senthara ya New Beginnings
newBeginnings.services: Yindlu ya nkarhi wo koma, dyondzo ya ntirho, dyondzo ya vana
newBeginnings.description: Senthara leyi pfunaka vanwana na ku aka ku tiyimela.

hopeCentre.name: Senthara ya Hope Centre
hopeCentre.services: Nseketelo wa miehleketo, dyondzo ya nawu, nseketelo wa rihanyu
hopeCentre.description: Senthara leyi nyikaka nseketelo wo hetiseka eka vanwana lava hluphekeke.

emergencyContacts.title: Vuhumelerisi bya Swiyimo swa Xihatla
emergencyContacts.subtitle: Tinomboro to fonela loko u lava nseketelo hi xihatla

gbvCommand.name: GBV Command Centre
gbvCommand.description: Nseketelo wa xihatla wa GBV wa rixaka hinkwaro

lifeline.name: Lifeline
lifeline.languages: Xinghezi, Xiafrikaans, na tindzimi to tala

police.name: Maphorisa
police.description: Nseketelo wa maphorisa wa swiyimo swa xihatla

legalResources.title: Nseketelo wa Nawu
legalResources.subtitle: Kuma rungula hi timfanelo ta wena na ndlela yo kuma nseketelo wa nawu

legalAid.title: Legal Aid South Africa
legalAid.description: Nseketelo wa nawu wa mahala eka vanwana lava lavaka
legalAid.services: Dyondzo ya nawu, ku yimeleriwa eka tikhothi, nseketelo wa nawu

wlce.title: Women's Legal Centre
wlce.description: Senthara leyi tikhomeke eka ku pfuna vanwana hi nawu
wlce.services: Dyondzo ya nawu, dyondzo ya timfanelo, ku sirhelela

familyLaw.title: Dyondzo ya Nawu wa Ndyangu
familyLaw.description: Nseketelo wa nawu wa timhaka ta ndyangu
familyLaw.services: Ku hambana, ku godisa vana, vutomi bya vanhu vaviri

supportGroups.title: Mintlawa ya Nseketelo
supportGroups.subtitle: Vuhumelerisi na vanwana lava hundzeke swilo swo fana

survivors.name: Ntlawa wa Lava Pholeke
survivors.schedule: Musati vhiki yin'wana na yin'wana hi 18:00
survivors.description: Ntlawa wo fihliwa wa lava pholeke va GBV

healing.name: Ntlawa wa ku Phola
healing.schedule: Ravumundzuku vhiki yin'wana na yin'wana hi 19:00
healing.description: Ntlawa wo kongomisa ku phola ka miehleketo

empowerment.name: Ntlawa wa ku Tiyisisa
empowerment.schedule: Mugqivela vhiki yin'wana na yin'wana hi 10:00
empowerment.description: Ntlawa wo tiyisisa vanwana na ku aka ku tiyimela

tips.tip1: Cinca ndlela ya wena yo famba nkarhi wun'wana na wun'wana
tips.tip2: Byela munhu un'wana laha u yaka kona
tips.tip3: Hlayisa nomboro yo fonela ya swiyimo swa xihatla yi lulamerile
tips.tip4: Tshemba miehleketo ya wena - loko swi vonaka swi nga hlayiseki, suka

tips.tip1: Tirhisa maphasiwedi ya matimba naswona u ma cinca nkarhi wun'wana na wun'wana
tips.tip2: Kambela swiyimo swa wena swa social media
tips.tip3: Tiva ndlela yo fihla ndhawu ya wena
tips.tip4: Tirhisa browser ya private mode loko u lava nseketelo

emergencyPreparedness.title: Ku Lulamisela ka Swiyimo swa Xihatla

tips.tip1: Endla pulani yo fihliwa yo baleka
tips.tip2: Hlayisa mali, matsalwa, na swambalo etindhawini leti fihliweke
tips.tip3: Tiva tinomboro leti faneleke to fonela
tips.tip4: Pulana ndhawu yo sirheleka laha u nga yaka kona

aiAssistant.title: Mupfuni wa AI
aiAssistant.subtitle: Vutisa swivutiso swa wena naswona u kuma switsundzuxo leswi endleriweke
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Xewani! Ndzi mupfuni wa wena wa AI. Ndzi nga ku pfuna njhani namuntlha?

questions.financialSeminars: Ndzi nga kuma njhani rungula hi tikhongolose ta mali?
questions.safeShelters: Ndzi nga kuma kwihi tindhawu ta vuhlayiseki?
questions.sanitaryProducts: Ndzi nga kuma njhani swilo swa ku basisa?
questions.submitRequest: Ndzi nga rhumela njhani xikombelo xa nseketelo?
questions.availableServices: I swihi switirhelo leswi nga kona?

chatHistory.title: Matimu ya Vulavurisano
chatHistory.empty: A ku na matimu ya vulavurisano

mockResponses.response1: Ndzi twisisa! Hi nga ku pfuna hi tikhongolose to hambana ta mali. Languta tluka ra hina ra Finance ku kuma rungula ro hetiseka hi tikhongolose leti taka.
mockResponses.response2: Vuhlayiseki bya wena i swa nkoka. Hi nga ku pfuna hi tindhawu to sirheleka leti sirhelekeke, tinomboro ta swiyimo swa xihatla, na nseketelo wa nawu. Languta tluka ra hina ra GBV Support.
mockResponses.response3: Hi na mabokisi ya mpfuno ya swilo swa ku basisa eAfrika Dzonga hinkwayo. Languta tluka ra hina ra Sanitary Aid ku kuma ndhawu leyi nga kufupi na wena.
mockResponses.response4: Hi nga ku hlanganisa na nseketelo wa nawu wa mahala. Legal Aid South Africa yi nyika nseketelo wa mahala eka vanwana lava lavaka. Fonela 0800 110 110.
mockResponses.response5: Loko u ri eka swiyimo swa xihatla, fonela 10111 (maphorisa) kumbe 0800 428 428 (GBV Command Centre) hi xihatla. Vuhlayiseki bya wena i swa nkoka.

footer.disclaimer: Mupfuni wa AI wu pfuna ntsena kambe a wu tshinyi ndhawu ya dyondzo ya vadokodela. Loko u lava nseketelo wa swiyimo swa xihatla, vuhumelerisi na vadokodela.

about.title: Hi EmpowerHub
about.subtitle: EmpowerHub yi tiyimisela vanhu va vukati eAfrika Dzonga hi ku nyika switsundzuxo swa mali leswi endlekiweke na mihlangano, nseketelo wa xihatla wa GBV na tindhawu to sirheleka to hlayiseka, na ku fikelela eka mabokisi ya nyikelo ya ku basisa. Leswi i xitshunxo xa ku hlanganisa lexi kombisaka ku tikhoma ka hina eka ku tiyimisela ku tiyimela, ku sirheleka na xikwembu.
about.missionText: Ku tumbuluxa pulatifomo ya ku hlanganisa leyi tiyimiselaka vanhu va vukati eAfrika Dzonga hinkwayo hi ku nyika vukorhokeri bya nseketelo byo hetiseka lebyi langutanaka na ku tiyimela ka mali, ku sirheleka ka munhu, na swilaveko swa xisekelo xa ku basisa eka xitshunxo xin'we lexi fikelelekaka.

financialEmpowerment.title: Ku Tiyimisela hi Mali
financialEmpowerment.description: Switsundzuxo swa mali leswi endlekiweke, mihlangano ya mali, na switirhisiwa swo aka ku tiyimela ka ikhonomi.

gbvSupport.title: Nseketelo wa GBV
gbvSupport.description: Nseketelo wa xihatla na tindhawu to sirheleka to hlayiseka eka vanhu va vukati lava langutanaka na nhlamhelo lowu seketeriweke eka buvukati.

sanitaryAid.title: Mpfuno wa Ku Basisa
sanitaryAid.description: Ku fikelela eka swilo swa ku basisa leswi lavekaka hi mabokisi ya nyikelo lama vekiweke hi vutlhari.

empowerment.title: Ku Tiyimisela
empowerment.description: Hi tshemba eka ku tiyimisela ku tiyimela ka vanhu va vukati hi dyondzo, switirhisiwa na nseketelo.

safety.title: Ku Sirheleka
safety.description: Ku tiyisisa ku fikelela ka xihatla ka tindhawu to hlayiseka na nseketelo wa vanhu va vukati eka swiyimo swa swiphiqo.

dignity.title: Xikwembu
dignity.description: Ku nyika switirhisiwa leswi lavekaka loko ku hlayisiwa xikwembu na ku fihliwa ka munhu wa vukati un'wana na un'wana.

community.title: Vaaki
community.description: Ku aka netiweke ya matimba ya nseketelo hi migingiriko leyi hoxiweke hi vaaki na vutshamisano.

about.techDescription: EmpowerHub yi tirhisa theknoloji ya sweswi ku nyika pulatifomo ya nseketelo yo hlanganisa. Kombiso ya hina ya sweswi yi kombisa xifaniso xa mutirhisi na ntirho wa xisekelo, na milawu yo hlanganisa swihlawulekisi leswi hundzukeke leswi katsakanyaka:

futureFeaturesList.aiSupport: Nseketelo lowu hoxiweke hi AI na switsundzuxo
futureFeaturesList.blockchain: Ku hlanganisa ka blockchain na BlockDAG
futureFeaturesList.database: Ku hlayisa ka database na nxopaxopo
futureFeaturesList.metamask: Ku hlanganisa ka MetaMask ka mabindzu yo hlayiseka

about.demoNote: Leyi kombiso yi kombisa miehleketo ya xitshunxo xo hlanganisa, lexi endlekiweke ku pfumelela nhluvukiso wo tiyimela wa swihlawulekisi loko ku hlayisiwa mavonelo ya mutirhisi lama ringanaka. Xivumbeko xa modular xi pfumelela ku antswisiwa ka vumundzuku handle ko khomela ntirho wa xisekelo.
